attributes.action: Water shortage caused by poor management - The privitised water companies have no interest in solving the problem.
attributes.additional_details:
The current water shortage causing us to be in drought conditions despite the wettest April for 100 years is caused by a lack of management of the resources.
Currently we have more water than we know what to do with - and there is no where to store it. Building storage would cost the water companies money - but they would gain nothing from it.
Banning hoses actually saves the water companies huge amounts of money as they do not have to pump or purify the water - hence with a hoepipe ban in place, and no reductions in bills they make lots of money.
This has to change - we have global warming to deal with!
